effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used grass pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon have halved Speed for four turns (including this one).
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used grass pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon have halved Speed for four turns (including this one).

short_effect.x-y: With Grass Pledge, halves opposing Pokémon’s Speed for four turns.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: With Grass Pledge, halves opposing Pokémon’s Speed for four turns.

flavor_text.x-y: A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, the damage increases and a rainbow appears.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, the damage increases and a rainbow appears.
